application

Class StaffController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.StaffController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class StaffController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller of the edit staff screen: EditStaff.fxml. Provides add, remove and replace method to edit the staff accounts.
    Since:
    2016-12-16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mingxuan Mei

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaffController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activityLog(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      activityLog Switch the screen to ActivityLog.fxml (allows the manager to view records of staffs and manager activities).
      void add(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      add add the given staff account with content in all specified fields into the database and the TableView staffTable.
      void backToAdmi(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      backToAdmi switch the screen back to AdmiIn.fxml.
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      initialize Initialise the screens with TableView staffTable, populate the TableView with current staff accounts in the database.
      void remove(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      remove Remove the selected staff account from TableView staffTable and database.
      void replace(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      replace Replace the selected staff account with content in all specified fields and write the changes into the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
